46 /*
47  * This type is a declaration only statement: the real type is defined inside
48  * XA Resource header file. Here we just need to store a pointer to
49  * a XA Resource inside an XA Transaction.
50  */
51 typedef struct xta_xa_resource_s xta_xa_resource_t;

140  int xta_transaction_open(xta_transaction_t *transact) DEPRECATED ;
141  /*
142  * Prepare the XA Resource Managers and the XA Transaction Manager for a
143  * new transactional Unit of Work. From the XA specification point of view,
144  * it calls xa_open (for the Native XA Resource Managers)
145  * @param[in,out] transact : transaction object
146  * @return a reason code
147  */
148  int xta_transaction_open_internal(xta_transaction_t *transact);
149 
150 
151 
155  int xta_transaction_close(xta_transaction_t *transact) DEPRECATED ;
156  /*
157  * Shut down the XA Resource Managers and the XA Transaction Manager after
158  * transactional Unit of Work completion. From the XA specification point
159  * of view, it calls xa_close (for the Native XA Resource Managers)
160  * @param[in,out] transact : transaction object
161  * @return a reason code
162  */
163  int xta_transaction_close_internal(xta_transaction_t *transact);
164
